Connect to TT Demo server:
ttConnect()

```{r}
options(warn=-1)
require(rClr)
require(FdkRLib)
ttConnect()
```



<p>Get 10000 bars of EURUSD symbol:</p>
head(ttBars("EURUSD"))

```{r}
head(ttBars("EURUSD"))
```

<p>Get 10000 bar pairs of EURUSD symbol:</p>
bars = ttBarPairs("EURUSD")

```{r}
head(ttBarPairs("EURUSD"))
```


Get quotes
```{r}
head(ttQuotes("EURUSD", startTime= as.POSIXct(x = "2015-06-10", tz="UTC")))
```

Get trades of current account
```{r}
head(ttTrades())
```
